level.heading: Corporation's acquisition of its own shares.

level.text: A corporation may acquire its own shares and shares so acquired shall constitute authorized but unissued shares.
If the articles of incorporation prohibit the reissue of the acquired shares, the number of authorized shares shall be reduced by the number of shares acquired.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-308.05.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
